column1: The Pit Room////Tremendous BBQ Briquet and sausage with amazing potato salad and Mac and cheese. It's a laid back atmosphere and overall very nice with helpful service. It's crowded often but with good reason
column2: they're capable of standing out even here in Texas where BBQ is king above all others. I like my brisquet salty so if salt isn't your thing I would choose maybe the ribs or sausage. Personal preference is key here but this place is awesome!
